column2: Orthanc]]'', [[Didier Willis]] has suggested that ''thanc'' (retaining the same meaning) would be valid [[Sindarin]].<ref>[[Didier Willis]], [http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] at [http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com] (accessed 19 June 2011)</ref>
